column4: my software center button does not work.  when i run it from a terminal using gksu software-center however it runs fine.  how can i tell unity to run it as root
seems to be the ubuntu-software one in that folder editting now ty
change the exec line and add gksudo, you will then be prompted for your password
seems to be the ubuntu-software one in that folder editting now and yep it worked thanks
